Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Archer/Wood
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are rerouted via Damen, Blue Island, Western, 35th Street, Leavitt, then resume their normal route on Damen due to street blockage nr Archer/Wood

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Blue Island, Western, 35th Street, Leavitt, then resume their normal route on Damen due to street blockage near Archer/Wood.

Allow extra travel time.
